title: Blended Learning Design for University Chemistry Education: Customized Approaches for Professional Learners

context.additional_context: Professional group in medical/legal/technical fields lacking foundational chemistry knowledge but requiring practical application; possesses digital device proficiency but chemistry domain expertise at beginner level

learning_goals: Learners can explain chemical phenomena encountered in daily tasks through chemical equations and molecular structure interpretation.
Learners can analyze complex chemical concepts with over 80% accuracy using video materials and simulation tools within an LMS.
Learners can write reports applying chemical principles to real-world cases through online discussions and collaborative projects.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
